item.title: Lian add a quote by William S. Burroughs
item.description: "A paranoid is someone who knows a little of what's going on. " -- William S. Burroughs

item.title: Lian add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Lian add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Lian add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Lian add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Lian add a quote by Dee
item.description: "Kalau lawan bicaramu mendengar dengan sepenuh hati, beban pikiranmu menjadi ringan. Kalau kamu tambah ruwet, meski yang mendengarkanmu tadi seolah serius mendengar, berarti dia tidak benar-benar hadir untukmu." -- Dee

item.title: Lian add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Don't feel sorry for yourself. Only assholes do that." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Lian add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Lian add a quote by tasaro
item.description: "suatu saat, mencintai adalah memutar hari tanpa seseorang yang engkau cintai. sebab dengan atau tanpa seseorang yang kamu kasihi, hidup harus tetap dijalani" -- tasaro

item.title: Lian add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "If a man is called to be a street sweeper, he should sweep streets even as a Michaelangelo painted, or Beethoven composed music or Shakespeare wrote poetry. He should sweep streets so well that all the hosts of heaven and earth will pause to say, 'Here lived a great street sweeper who did his job well." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Lian add a quote by Pat Conroy
item.description: "You get a little moody sometimes but I think that's because you like to read. People that like to read are always a little fucked up." -- Pat Conroy

item.title: Lian add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "So many people enter and leave your life! Hundreds of thousands of people! You have to keep the door open so they can come in! But it also means you have to let them go!" -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Lian add a quote by Phyllis Diller
item.description: "A smile is a curve that sets everything straight." -- Phyllis Diller

item.title: Lian add a quote by William Nicholson
item.description: "We read to know we're not alone." -- William Nicholson

item.title: Lian add a quote by W. Somerset Maugham
item.description: "You're beginning to dislike me, aren't you? Well, dislike me. It doesn't make any difference to me now." -- W. Somerset Maugham

item.title: Lian add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Numbing the pain for a while will make it worse when you finally feel it." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Lian add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "Imagine smiling after a slap in the face. Then think of doing it twenty-four hours a day." -- Markus Zusak
